name: Employee Database
description: Company employee information including salaries, ages, and names

metadata.notes: Executor will parse returned JSON and render structured employee statistics. If API fails, fallback will be used.
metadata.longDescription:
Title: Employee Database

Summary: Live employee data from a demo API.

What I can read: The HTTP endpoint configured in this descriptor.

What I can do: Return structured employee lists and basic statistics (count, avg salary).

How to ask: "List employees"; "Show average salary by department"

Limitations: This data is fetched live and may be incomplete or rate-limited.
